channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D1Ksi.png[/img]
[B]Links:[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eBAFt.png[/img][url=http://embassy-317.co.cc/forums]Forums[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/44Oej.png[/img][url=http://embassy-317.co.cc/webclient.php]Webclient[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rlb3P.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/36288851/Embassy-317%20Desktop%20Client.rar]Client[/url]
[b]Forum features.[/b] • Reliable and fast web hosting. • Updated frequently. • SMF forums. • Easy to use. • Friendly staff and community. • Clean and tidy.
[b]Server Features:[/b] • [u]99.9%[/u] update time. • Dupes patched. • Great combat. • Instant G maul special. • Various different PK locations. • All NPC's have relevant dialogue. • Suitable PKP rewards, priced at reasonable prices. • Curse prayers, leech's, turmoil, soulsplit etc. • New shop and bank interface. • New skill tab w/ hovering. • New friends list/ignore list.
[B]Media:[/B] (Not a lot of media I can show on an instant PK server).

item.title: Embassy-317

item.description:

Haven’t received any problems yet, but I will remove it regardless.

item.title: Embassy-317
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Xx Weed Xx:

I got a backed up copy of it without Hyperion core I may use that then, If people hate it that much.

Use what you want, but; they’ve been around and know a lot more than most of this site. You’d be idiotic not to take their advice.

Read full topic

item.title: Embassy-317
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

It’s not because we ‘hate’ it, the core may be a nice addition, yes. But it does cause problems.

I’m not telling you not to use it, I’m just informing you of the probable issues you may encounter.

Read full topic

item.title: Embassy-317
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx

I got a backed up copy of it without Hyperion core I may use that then, If people hate it that much.

item.title: Embassy-317
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:8, topic:459019”]I’m not raging, and yes it may look as it will cause a performance increase. But there are several concurrency issues that occur whenever events are executed along with the server processes. (May not make sense my terminology is quite lacking)

e.g: playerHandler.process(), npcHandler.process(), etcetera and so forth.[/quote]
Listen to this man. He knows how to spell etcetera.

But seriously, I have been told by many what Atomic is saying right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Embassy-317
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I’m not raging, and yes it may look as it will cause a performance increase. But there are several concurrency issues that occur whenever events are executed along with the server processes. (May not make sense my terminology is quite lacking)

e.g: playerHandler.process(), npcHandler.process(), etcetera and so forth.

Read full topic

item.title: Embassy-317
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:6, topic:459019”]For the last time, Hyperion’s core, event, tick, task, etc. systems are only meant for HYPERION. Not to be ripped and placed into shitty Project Insanity’s.

I’ve done it and ran into countless problems. (Ask Loveandpower)
Graham has even said this himself.

Anyway, good luck, Dan.[/quote]

You’re ragging over me adding a feature that will most likely improve the performance of my server??

Read full topic

item.title: Embassy-317
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

For the last time, Hyperion’s core, event, tick, task, etc. systems are only meant for HYPERION. Not to be ripped and placed into shitty Project Insanity’s.

I’ve done it and ran into countless problems. (Ask Loveandpower)
Graham has even said this himself.

Anyway, good luck, Dan.

Read full topic
